site_description: Free, offline-capable mental health crisis resources for anywhere in the world
emergency_description: Contact local emergency services or visit the nearest hospital. This page provides crisis support resources but is not a substitute for emergency care.
crisis_lines_description: We don't have specific crisis lines for your location yet, but these international organizations can help you find local resources.

crisis_lines.name: Befrienders Worldwide
crisis_lines.description: Global network of emotional support centers. Find your local Befrienders center for crisis support in your language.

crisis_lines.name: International Association for Suicide Prevention (IASP)
crisis_lines.description: Global directory of suicide prevention and crisis centers. Search by country to find resources near you.

crisis_lines.name: Findahelpline.com
crisis_lines.description: International directory of mental health helplines. Search by country and language.

crisis_lines.name: Wikipedia: List of Suicide Crisis Lines
crisis_lines.description: Comprehensive list of crisis lines by country maintained by the Wikipedia community.

footer_disclaimer: This site provides information about crisis support services. If you're experiencing a mental health emergency, please contact local emergency services or visit a hospital.

contribute.message: üåç Help us add your country to WE4Free
contribute.description: We're building a free, offline-capable mental health crisis resource for every country in the world. If you know crisis lines for your region, we need your help!
contribute.instructions: Visit our GitHub repository or email us with crisis line information for your country. We'll help you create a configuration file.

_meta.purpose: Phase 2 Unlock: Global safety net when country config doesn't exist
behavior: If user's country has no config, load this instead
If offline and country config missing, serve cached international.json
Service worker must ALWAYS cache this file as critical resource
Shows international directories instead of direct crisis lines
guarantees: No user ever sees blank screen
Works in war zones, refugee camps, disaster areas
Always functional offline after first load
Safe degradation when specific resources unavailable
implementation: Build process: Try config_<country>.json ‚Üí if missing ‚Üí international.json
Service worker: Cache international.json with highest priority
UI: Show contribute banner when in fallback mode
Detection: Browser language/timezone hints which region to emphasize
